entry.title: How to deploy Python Lambda function using AWS stack only?
entry.summary:
Description

Let’s have a challenge. Is it possible to use the AWS tooling only to deploy Lambda function? During this hands-on talk we will check it! Using CloudFormation we will create CodePipeline which will deploy Lambda using… CloudFormation! Is this stack and approach reliable? Is it a good choice …
entry.content:
Description

Let’s have a challenge. Is it possible to use the AWS tooling only to deploy Lambda function? During this hands-on talk we will check it! Using CloudFormation we will create CodePipeline which will deploy Lambda using… CloudFormation! Is this stack and approach reliable? Is it a good choice when designing CI/CD for the project? Let’s figure it out. More than half of this talk we will spend on VSCode, AWS console and CLI. You will be able to feel the work of DevOps!
